member.name: T:Ortskurve.Diagram
member.summary: This Class can be used to draw a XY Plot

member.name: M:Ortskurve.Diagram.Draw
member.summary: Draws the Plot to the UI

member.name: M:Ortskurve.Diagram.addDot(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a Dot to the draw buffer, the dots are internally stored in a List

member.name: M:Ortskurve.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This program plots locus diagrams. It was written by me to try C# and learn something about complex numbers
